Text: EOL Changes Cc network changes are being planned for EOL Feb Saturday From am am Enron Network Services will be upgrading the EOL UUNET network connection one of Enrons ISP from Mbps to Mbps Because UUNET is not the primary EOL link the outage is not expected to impact many of the EOL users However if users have their connection configured to UUNET as their preferred ISP they may have to reconnect and may experience intermittent outages during this maintenance Feb Saturday From am pm Enron Network Services will be upgrading the EOL Internet network switches A total outage of EOL is expected The outage should last approximately minutes Please notify Jean McFarland or Mary Vollmer if you have any questions Bob Martinez

FW A Change Control Project Has Been Created With Emergency Status for MNjust received this Emergency Change impacting EOL Please insure all processing is done by pm today The Building Facilities group is adding additional power sources to the EOL equipment racks The EOL team plans to bring down the EOL Production Data Bases during this time period Bob Martinez Original Message From Nguyen Mai Sent Friday February AM To Enron Change Management Subject A Change Control Project Has Been Created With Emergency Status for MN Importance High EMERGENCY UPDATE It was created by Mai Nguyen The title of the project is EOL Power issue The change number for the project is MN Impact EOL Time Fri at PM thru Fri at PM Outage EOL Power issue Disruption Total Disruption of Service Environments Impacted EOL Purpose Power Redundancy for EOL Backout Contacts Mai Nguyen Document Link
